Experience

The Tanda Tula Camps are set within the game-packed private Timbavati Nature Reserve in the Greater Kruger Region & is home to the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino.
Tanda Tula in the Timbavati features 4 camps – Tanda Tula Safari Camp, Tanda Tula Field Camp, Tanda Tula Plains Camp & Tanda Tula Nkarhi Homestead.
Safari Camp is renowned as one of the most luxurious tented camps in South Africa & Field Camp is an exclusive mobile tented eco-camp with an emphasis on walking safaris. Plains Camp boasts private plunge pools & spectacular views while Nkarhi Homestead offers guests an off-the-grid experience with total exclusivity.
Tanda Tula promises an unforgettable experience in game viewing, warm hospitality & award-winning cuisine.

Stay

Tanda Tula Nkarhi Homestead is an exclusive-use farm-style villa, elevated above vast plains & winding rivers, allowing guests uninterrupted views of the sweeping vistas across the Timbavati.
This self-catering bush villa offers guests the opportunity to relax & connect with nature at their own pace.
There are 4 farm-style bedrooms, sleeping a maximum of 8 guests. The main cottage has a fully equipped kitchen & 2 en-suite bedrooms, while the family cottage features 2 bedrooms with a large inter-leading bathroom.
There is also a separate cottage featuring a lounge & dining room overlooking the swimming pool & boma.

Activities

Activities at Nkarhi Homestead include open 4x4 game drives, walking safaris, sundowner bush stops & star gazing. The villa also offers fun board games for the family!

subfolders.title: Kings Camp
subfolders.description: The exceptional Kings Camp is situated in a quiet corner of the famous Timbavati Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa. Kings Camp reflects something of a romantic, colonial Africa & faces an open savanna plain with a waterhole, which is visited by a wide variety of animals. The camp features 7 luxury suites, 2 honeymoon suites & 1 private villa named Waterbuck Private Villa.

subfolders.title: Makanyi Lodge
subfolders.description: Makanyi Lodge is a private safari haven in the heart of the Timbavati Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region. The lodge overlooks a permanent waterhole & is frequented by animals daily – so guests can sit on the deck while watching them drink or play in the water below. Makani Lodge is the ideal choice for the discerning traveller looking for a luxurious Kruger safari experience & excellent wildlife sightings.

subfolders.title: Motswari Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Motswari Game Lodge lies in the Timbavati Reserve, part of the Greater Kruger National Park Conservancy & is home to Africa’s Big 5. This area is popular for its frequent Big 5 sightings as well as the elusive wild dog & cheetah. Motswari Game Lodge consists of 15 luxury bungalows (inclusive of 2 sets of inter-leading rooms), accommodating a maximum of 30 guests.  Each bungalow features an en-suite bathroom & magnificent bush or river views.

subfolders.title: Ngala Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Set in the heart of the Timbavati Reserve in South Africa’s Greater Kruger region, Ngala provides guests with an extraordinary Big 5 safari experience. Ngala features 2 unique safari lodges - Ngala Safari Lodge & Ngala Tented Camp.  Ngala Safari Lodge is a great option for families & Ngala Tented Camp is ideal for couples or honeymooners. Ngala Safari Lodge is a colonial-style safari lodge & is renowned for its superb accommodation.  There are 20 thatched cottages, 3 family cottages & a family suite.

subfolders.title: Ngala Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Set in the heart of the Timbavati Reserve in South Africa’s Greater Kruger region, Ngala provides guests with an extraordinary Big 5 safari experience. Ngala features 2 unique safari lodges - Ngala Safari Lodge & Ngala Tented Camp.  Ngala Safari Lodge is a great option for families & Ngala Tented Camp is ideal for couples or honeymooners. Ngala Tented Camp is a sophisticated, intimate camp set in the heart of Big 5 Country, overlooking a seasonal riverbed.  There are only 9 tented suites built on raised wooden platforms, each equipped with an en-suite bathroom & outdoor shower.

subfolders.title: Rock Fig Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Rock Fig Safari Lodge is a relaxed, but luxurious lodge located within the world-renowned Timbavati Reserve in the Greater Kruger. Rock Fig is the perfect bush destination for families with children of all ages, or a group of friends.  Since the lodge is small & intimate (only 6 suites), it can be booked out on an exclusive use basis, so guests are ensured a private safari experience. There are only 6 luxurious suites at Rock Fig Safari Lodge.  Each air-conditioned room has an en-suite bathroom with a bath as well as an indoor & outdoor shower.  Bunker beds can be added for parents travelling with small kids.

subfolders.title: Simbavati Hilltop Lodge
subfolders.description: The Simbavati Lodges are located within the heart of the Timbavati Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region & offers phenomenal Big 5 wildlife viewing. There are 2 lodges at Simbavati – one is located on a hill - Simbavati Hilltop Lodge, & the other is located by a river - Simbavati River Lodge. Hilltop Lodge is the more luxurious of the 2 lodges & is geared towards adults (no children under 12 years old), whereas River Lodge is a relaxed, family-friendly camp.  Both lodges boast incredible views over the Nhlaralumi River.
